title: authenticating forever~~~~~~AGAIN!!!!
body: Just few moment ago, i cant log in with the problem "authenticating... forever". I used to face this issue many times(3-4times), then I will switch back to the old client, then it works.  And now, the old client has RETIRED....how to fix???

replies.body: Same problem here. Reinstalled windows, reinstalled league, went though ritos connection guide 4x. nothing works. My brother uses the same  connection and it works fine for him.

Well hey there again Illiad! I answered the same question when you posted over on the megathread, but I didn't want to leave you hanging here either. 

It sounds like your network is having a hard time getting a solid connection with our login servers. Without a stable connection, your client can't see whether or not your information matches the login info we have on file. Go through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and you should be back on track.

Hit me back if that doesn't seem to help!
